title: Are public and private schools the same? - Quora

response.answer_text: In many ways both private and public schools are the same. Both require homework and have mandatory classes and standardize testing. They are also different as if a child misbehaves a private school can kick them out and not give a refund. Also supports are usually handled differently. Depending on the school mgs themselves you will find both similarities and differences.

In Britain all “public schools” are private but not vice versa. A “public school” is one which dates from the days when otherwise you would have to go to a monastery for an educaiton. Therefore very often boarding schools still. But similarly not all boarding schools are “public schools.” A state school is not fee paying at all.
